hero.name: Juan Diego Restrepo Bayer
hero.role: Junior Frontend Developer & Creative Web Developer

about.title: About Me
about.summary: Junior Frontend Developer and Software Development Technologist from SENA, with experience building educational and institutional web applications. Focused on modern, responsive and optimized interfaces using React and Tailwind CSS, with a strong interest in continuous learning and professional growth.

items.title: Coworking Inmobiliario - Full Platform
items.description: Complete web platform for real estate company including public website with property management, real estate news, comprehensive services (rentals, sales, appraisals) and administrative dashboard with authentication, property management, users and content. Integration with Supabase for database and storage.

items.title: SENNOVA Project - SENA
items.description: Educational web application for managing research and innovation projects at SENA. Modern interface development with React, implementation of reusable components and performance optimization for better user experience.

items.title: Frontend Developer
items.description: Development of educational web applications using React and Tailwind CSS. Team collaboration for feature implementation and user experience improvement.

items.title: Frontend Developer
items.description: Development of complete web platform with React, TypeScript and Supabase. Implementation of administrative dashboard with secure authentication.

items.title: Digital Marketing Assistant
items.description: Support in digital content management and website maintenance. Creation of graphic pieces and web platform updates.
